short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension that allows users to create folders and save their chats in relevant folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"ChatGPT Chat Organizer" is a must-have extension for ChatGPT users who want to streamline their chat management. This tool allows you to create custom folders and save your conversations in an organized manner, making it easier to access and review your extensive chat history.

Why Install This Extension?

- Enhanced Organization: Easily create folders for different topics, projects, or categories, ensuring that your chats are neatly sorted.
- Quick Access: Save time by having all your relevant chats in designated folders, allowing for faster retrieval and reference.
- User-Friendly Interface: The extension is designed to be intuitive and simple, making chat organization a breeze even for non-technical users.
- Increased Productivity: By keeping your chat history organized, you can focus more on the content and less on searching for past conversations.

Whether you're using ChatGPT for work, study, or personal projects, "chatGPT chat organizer" helps you maintain an organized chat environment, enhancing your overall productivity and user experience.
